roof.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the structure that covers or forms the top of a building, vehicle, tent etc
roof.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: They finally found the cat up on the roof.
We can probably strap the cases to the roof of her car.
roof.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the top of a passage under the ground
roof.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Suddenly, the whole tunnel roof caved in.
roof.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: She used to sunbathe on the flat roof.
The path led to a log cabin with a chalet-style sloping roof.
a row of garages with tiled pitched roofs.
She lived in a pretty country cottage with a thatched roof.
We needed to fix the leaky roof.
roof.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to put a roof on a building
roof.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: a cottage roofed with the local slate
